SRP.Q: In the radar chart, what is the next dimension in the clockwise direction from Citation Rate?
SRP.A: The next dimension clockwise from Citation Rate is R&D ROI (Return on Investment)

SRP.A: The next dimension counterclockwise from Citation Rate is Research Growth Rate.

SRP.Q: On the Innovation Rate, is the point for Obrien, Roberts and Fisher Biotech inside or outside the point for Melton Group Robotics?
SRP.A: On the Innovation Rate, the point for Obrien, Roberts and Fisher Biotech is outside the point for Melton Group Robotics.

VPR.A: label {Innovation Rate} encloses the largest score

VPR.Q: What are the strongest and weakest dimension of Melton Group Robotics?
VPR.A: The strongest aspect is {Innovation Rate}, while the weakest aspect is{ Interdisciplinary Collaboration Rate }.

VPR.Q: On dimension Innovation Rate, which label scores the highest?
VPR.A: On Innovation Rate, label {Melton Group Robotics} scores the highest.

VPR.Q: On dimension R&D ROI (Return on Investment), which label scores the highest?
VPR.A: On R&D ROI (Return on Investment), label {Obrien, Roberts and Fisher Biotech} scores the lowest.
